roleset.name: contemplate an action
roleset.note: Frames file for 'evaluate' based on annotation-on-the-fly of the financial subcorpus, and comparison with 'consider'. No entry in verbnet.

roleset.name: Monitor or measure a medical condition

example.name: All args
example.text: When-1 can you safely evaluate a young woman with chest pain for coronary artery disease *t*-1?
example.arg: a young woman with chest pain
